nodes.text: Scazz were creatures that lived on the planet Zeffo. They were vulnerable in bright light due to their poor vision, often residing in shady or dark areas. While visiting Zeffo during the Imperial Era, the former Jedi Padawan Cal Kestis was attacked by several scazz. Their meat was considered to be edible.

Scazz first appeared in the 2019 video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, developed by Respawn Entertainment. During development, the creature needed to fill the role of being quick and repugnant so that the player wouldn't feel sympathy for it as an enemy. The development team eventually settled on a bipedal rat. Scazz concept art was done by artist Jean-Francois Rey.
